title: The Other side
creator_contributor_role: Advanced Diploma of Multimedia (ADoM), Swinburne University of Technology (formerly Electronic Design and Interactive Media (EDIM), production company
abstract: A journey by a moustachioed man in a flying machine...
description: A 3D animation without dialogue. Kids will love this simple story with a Jules Verne influence. A moustached man in a brightly coloured flying machine travels through a surreal futuristic landscape searching for a lost city...Created using Lightwave, After FX and Premiere
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1005723; Swinburne EDIM Graduate Screening 2002 - Pixel-pusher; Active; 2002
active_carriers_public_types_and_formats: MPEG-2 Digital File; Memory Grid Pod Full Encode
